requirements.title: Session Lifecycle API
requirements.description: Go API providing session lifecycle endpoints, WebSocket streaming, and transcript persistence.

requirements.title: Configurable Default Commands
requirements.description: Configurable default command (`WEB_CONSOLE_DEFAULT_COMMAND`) plus per-session overrides via API.

requirements.title: Browser UI with Shortcuts
requirements.description: Browser UI (vanilla JS + xterm.js) with shortcut buttons for Codex, Claude, and `vrooli status` that queue commands until the PTY is ready.

requirements.title: Iframe Bridge Protocol
requirements.description: iframe bridge that publishes status/metadata via `postMessage` and responds to transcript/log/screenshot requests.

requirements.title: Proxy Guard Enforcement
requirements.description: Proxy guard enforcement that rejects requests lacking authenticated forwarding headers.

requirements.title: Security Documentation
requirements.description: Documentation emphasizing proxy-only deployment and shortcut behavior.

requirements.title: Concurrent Session Handling
requirements.description: Concurrent session handling with queueing when capacity is exhausted.

requirements.title: Prometheus Metrics
requirements.description: Prometheus metrics endpoint for session counters and failure modes.

requirements.title: Panic-Stop Endpoint
requirements.description: Panic-stop endpoint/UI control to terminate runaway commands.

requirements.title: Mobile-First UI
requirements.description: Mobile-first UI with reconnect/resume flows and quick command access.

requirements.title: Configurable Shortcut Palette
requirements.description: Configurable shortcut palette provided by parent scenario or service config.

requirements.title: Distributed Transcript Storage
requirements.description: Redis/Postgres adapters for distributed transcript storage.

requirements.title: Voice Dictation/TTS Integration
requirements.description: Voice dictation/TTS hooks that leverage shared resources.

requirements.title: Parent Callbacks
requirements.description: Parent callbacks for automated post-session archiving or compliance workflows.
